subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
lead_paragraph: Christian Laettner helped Duke win two N.C.A.A. basketball championships, was a member of the Dream Team at the Barcelona Olympics and played in the N.B.A. for 13 seasons.
snippet: Christian Laettner helped Duke win two N.C.A.A. basketball championships, was a member of the Dream Team at the Barcelona Olympics and played in the N.B.A. for 13 seasons.
